item.description: Guitarist/composer Flynn Cohen leads his own band of string geniuses performing original multi-genre acoustic music. Primarily instrumental, they combine influences ranging from Irish traditional music, old-time Appalachian, bluegrass, folk-rock, and early music. The band consists of some of the finest and most experienced acoustic plucked-string players in America. FLYNN COHEN–guitar/mandolin/vocals JOHN McGANN–guitar/mandolin MATT HEATON–guitar/bouzouki DANNY NOVECK–guitar/fiddle http://www.flynncohen... Suggested donation $14 + $1 preservation fee More information about the series: https://sites.google.... To reserve: notlobreservations at gmail dot com
item.name: Flynn Cohen and the Deadstring Ensemble
